subject: Football
lead_paragraph: While the Giants’ Eli Manning has almost retreated into a quiet and unassuming public life, the Cowboys’ Tony Romo has become known for his red-carpet appearances and romantic dalliances.
snippet: While the Giants’ Eli Manning has almost retreated into a quiet and unassuming public life, the Cowboys’ Tony Romo has become known for his red-carpet appearances and romantic dalliances.
